title: Jacket
description: black open front indigo; no design on front; center back has embroidered strip of abstract symbols; bottom edge and triangle corners have embroidered birds; framing shoulders, center strip and bottom edge are strips of embroidered flowers on paper backing cut out around flower edges and tacked on; sleeves have 6\" x 12\" green silk embroidery repeating same motifs; multicolor sleeves banded with white
